title: Діти бомбосховищ
overview: The series tells about Ukrainian children and their parents who experienced the terrible realities of war. Every child faced with the horrors of war needs protection and help in the future. These are real stories about how strangers became close, about children's games, songs in the dark, bedtime stories, life underground, and about simple children's dreams. The world will never be the same again, and the worst thing that can happen in life now is to be born a Russian, especially if you are an adequate person.
